experience.title: Operations Management Intern
experience.description: •	Worked on Worker Scheduling and Transport hiring.•	Used Cutting Stock Algorithm to minimize waste during cutting of sheet metal before fabrication.•	Researched on optimal sheet cutting processes and developed a cutting stock algorithm to minimize waste generated during sheet cutting, reducing costs by about 7%•	Developed a Solution on MS Excel using a modular approach and heuristic solution methodology for efficient costing of Structure Fabrication and Panel Wiring with an accuracy of about 92%
experience.description_html: • Worked on Worker Scheduling and Transport hiring.• Used Cutting Stock Algorithm to minimize waste during cutting of sheet metal before fabrication.• Researched on optimal sheet cutting processes and developed a cutting stock algorithm to minimize waste generated during sheet cutting, reducing costs by about 7%• Developed a Solution on MS Excel using a modular approach and heuristic solution methodology for efficient costing of Structure Fabrication and Panel Wiring with an accuracy of about 92%

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: •	Worked on a project for Government E-Marketplace under the Directorate General of Supplies and Disposal ( DGS&D ), India.  Worked on Data sanitation and Vendor Assessment. Also carried out various E-Auctions for companies.
